data.title: Club Information, DJs, Schedule & Tickets
data.meta_description: Pacha is an iconic Ibiza club located in Talamanca with the best DJs in town and a unique atmosphere that no other club can offer.
data.text:
If you long for a Gatsby-styled, out of the world clubbing experience, then this club is your happy place. Pacha is an iconic Ibiza club located in Talamanca, next to Ibiza Town. With some the best DJs on the island and a unique atmosphere, Pacha is the club that’s not to be missed out.

Since its conception in 1973, Pacha has been proudly associated with the “Ibiza clubbing” experience. It is the club that has for years carried the Ibiza tradition and is a perfect go-to venue for first-timers making their Ibiza clubbing debut.

In 2024, Pacha will host the Gran Opening Party on Friday, 26 April, with Marco Carola headlining the event.

Pacha is world famous and has a reputation of being one of the best dance clubs across the globe due to its immense international expansion. The club can accommodate around 3000 people and includes many VIP zones with varied environments to deliver an enhanced clubbing experience to everyone.

The jewel in the crown of the club is its the dancefloor, where the most jaw-dropping and fanciest of parties take place and provides a channel for anyone who is looking for a unique kind of party experience under one roof.

Pacha is a clubbing heaven where international DJs show off their skills, taking the night experience to its peak. The upper portion of the room has a beautiful terrace with soothing music playing in the background.

It’s time to get funky and visit Pacha to experience one of the best nightlife experiences in the world.

Pacha nightclub is one of the most visited in Ibiza, and its VIP zone is always full of people who want to experience the best of Ibiza’s parties. Luckily, there is plenty of space for everyone who wants to have the night of their life, thanks to different VIP zones. The main VIP area is divided into Zone J, Zone M, Zone B, and Zone 11, with each of the providing guests with a completely different experience. Balcony VIP has Zone 12 and Charlie, and there are two special VIP zones – Zone 1 and Old Booth.

The prices for VIP tables at Pacha are subject to a minimum spend, therefore you don’t pay for the table itself, but rather have a minimum amount that you need to spend on drinks.

The prices for VIP tables at Pacha depend on the event and where the table is located. The more popular the event and the better the view from the table, the higher the price. Just to give you a general idea, prices typically start at around €1,000.

VIP services in Pacha nightclub will help you have a memorable night and get back home full of stories. You can enjoy a private host who will be in charge of your table and take care that nothing is missing. You will also skip the long queue and get into the club quickly with VIP access.

To secure a table, we highly advise booking in advance, as the events are in high demand and tables tend to get reserved rapidly. You can either complete the form at the top of the page or get in touch with us
